title: Beregszász Multi-Resolution Survey
description: Nested survey tiles describing the Beregszász (Berehove) basin with terrain, transport, parcels, and buildings.

terrain.description: Palette-indexed ground cover and elevation hints spanning Zakarpattia.

vectors.description: Major rivers, railways, and arterial roads entering the Beregszász valley.

parcels.description: Generalized cadastral parcels for neighbourhood scale navigation.

buildings.description: Simplified building footprints used when zoomed to street level.

metadata.notes: Demonstration dataset for quadtree hydration showcasing Beregszász landmarks and neighbourhood structure.
